Staying on Twitter

It's really easy to keep mastadon a nicer place.

Secret formula I've followed since the days of Fidonet, newsgroups, IRC, mailing lists, forums and.. Twitter :

Follow kind people.
People who contribute to conversation and share joy, fallibility and mischief.

It'll rub off on you.
